doc.field: OSG:OSG User Certificate Request for Yujun Wu
Check for a response back from Yujun

Hello Alain,
Thanks for your help. I tried to submit using a specific VO, like Fermilab VO as shown in one of the Mine's presentations. But it is not in the pulldown menu. Could you please tell which one I should use in this case?
Thanks, Yujun Open Science Grid FootPrints wrote: > [Duplicate message snipped]

May I ask why you submitted a request under the OSG VO?
Thanks,
-Alain Deximo OSG RA

Dear Kyle Gross, Elizabeth Prout, Christopher Pipes, Alain Deximo (OSG VO RA/Sponsors),
An OIM Authenticated user; Yujun Wu <yujun@fnal.gov> has requested a user certificate. Please determine this request's authenticity, and approve / disapprove at https://oim.grid.iu.edu/oim/certificateuser?id=68
NOTE: Additional user certificate request NOTE: Requested DN: /DC=com/DC=DigiCert-Grid/O=Open Science Grid/OU=People/CN=Yujun Wu 923
Requester Comment: I am trying to use Fermilab VO. However, it is not in the production version of the certificate request. I hope OSG VO is ok to be used. If not, please e-mail me. Thanks in advance for your help on this.
Regards, Yujun
